result.title: Question: How to determine complexity from running time on test case?
result.content: Has anyone looked into the problem of determining the algorithmic complexity of a solution to a problem using the maximum solving time on test cases of different sizes? I imagine you could use least squares where the basis functions include some polynomials, some powers of log, an exponential and products of these up to a certain fixed size. It might be an interesting thing to calculate for complex solutions.
